snippet.title: A Maze 3D Update 1.5 | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
The update is out now!
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ErikHasanof.AMaze3D
Play Store:   https://apps.apple.com/us/app/a-maze-3d/id1561632976

Update 1.5 brings a bunch of new features, design changes and overall experience!
- New control mode: Swipe, drag your finger across the screen to control the ball!
- New feature: Ghost Ball, play versus the best version of yourself! 
Great for when you feel the stage is to empty, or you just need to see how much you've improved!
- New feature: Easy mode, for those who like to kick back and enjoy a smoother run, this is for you! 
Easy mode disables all in-game timers;
- There has been a great many smaller additions in this update, like color schemes for objectives like Keys & Gates to make it easier to identify which key goes where and so on, but we will let you discover those secrets yourself!


Hop on in and let's get rolling!

Credits:
Video Editing & Music: [Nareshps]
Video Game Developer: [Erik Hasanof]
